cast.overview: Alexandre, a man in his 40s living in Lyon with his wife and children, discovers that the priest who abused him decades ago continues to work with children. He joins forces with others victims of the priest, to bring justice and “lift the burden of silence” about what they endured.
cast.title: By the Grace of God

details.biography:
Bernard Verley (born 4 October 1939) is a French actor and producer.

Former student of les Beaux-Arts in Lille, he then joined the TNP Jean Vilar. His brother Renaud Verley is also an actor. In the mid-1970s, he devoted himself to film production. He returns as an actor in the 90s, after a break of nine years.

Source: Article "Bernard Verley" from Wikipedia in English, licensed under CC-BY-SA 3.0.
details.name: Bernard Verley
